title: Nijigaku: Towards the Shuffle Festival! Part 6
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Surprise interview! Kana-chan, tell us how you feel about the upcoming Shuffle Festival!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ooh, you finally came to interview me~. Hmm, let’s see~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah! Let’s hear it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>First of all, Kanata was really surprised when we decided to do a Shuffle Festival~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai was really excited when we first talked about it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Well, you see~, each of our first songs has a special meaning to every one of us, so don’t you feel nervous about singing them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm.... Ai can’t say that Ai doesn’t feel nervous at all, but my excitement wins over that nervousness~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ahaha, that’s just like you, Ai-chan~. Well, Kanata was nervous at first, but now, Kanata is looking forward to the live. Kanata wants to take in the feelings that everyone has put into their songs, channel them back into my performance while thinking about them, and convey them to everyone at the Shuffle Festival as my own feelings.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eh, you’re so amazing, Kana-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufufu. Look forward to it, okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
